import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import PropTypes from "prop-types" import { connect } from "react-redux" import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import PerfectScrollbar from 'react-perfect-scrollbar' import { injectIntl} from 'react-intl' import { Row, Card, CardBody } from "reactstrap" import { SignInUser } from "../../../constants/authActions" import { withSwalInstance } from 'sweetalert2-react' import Swal from 'sweetalert2' import { Colxx } from "../../../components/CustomBootstrap" import BreadcrumbContainer from "../../../components/BreadcrumbContainer" import IntlMessages from "../../../util/IntlMessages" import imgUserDefaultFame from '../../../assets/img/users/user1.jpg' import ImgTciketDefault from '../../../assets/img/tickets-default.png' const icon_cloud = '' const icon_plus = '' const icon_numTicket = '' const icon_titleTicket = '' let dateFormat = require('dateformat') let now = new Date() const TicketDetails = (props) => { // =============================================================== // Hooks useState // =============================================================== const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false) // Loading const [ticket, setTicket] = useState([]) const [comments, setComments] = useState([]) const [newcomment, setNewcomment] = useState("") const getId = props.location.pathname.toString().split("/") const {user} = props.authUser // =============================================================== // Hooks useEffect // =============================================================== useEffect(() => { const fetchTicketByNumber = async () => { const res = await axios.get(`/api/tickets/details/${getId[4]}`) setTicket(res.data.ticket) } fetchTicketByNumber() const fetchCommentsByTicket = async () => { const res = await axios.get(`/api/ticket/comments/list/${getId[4]}`) setComments(res.data.ticketcomments) } fetchCommentsByTicket() }, []) const onChangeComment = e => { if (loading) { return
} setNewcomment(e.target.value) } const newComment = { ticket: getId[4], name: user.name, email: user.email, avatar: user.avatar, description: newcomment } const addComment = async e => { e.preventDefault() await fetch('/api/ticket/comments/add', { method: 'POST', body: JSON.stringify(newComment), headers: { 'Accept': 'application/json', 'Content-Type': 'application/json' } }) .then(res => res.json()) .then(data => { const fetchComments = async () => { setLoading(true) const res = await axios.get(`/api/ticket/comments/list/${getId[4]}`) setComments(res.data.ticketcomments) withSwalInstance(Swal.fire({ position: 'top-end', type: 'success', title: 'Success!', text: 'The comment has been saved successfully', showConfirmButton: false, timer: 4500, // backdrop: false, toast: true })) setLoading(false) } fetchComments() setNewcomment("") }) .catch(err => { withSwalInstance(Swal.fire({ position: 'top-end', type: 'error', title: 'Success!', text: 'Oops!!!, somethings went wrong.', showConfirmButton: false, timer: 4500, // backdrop: false, toast: true })) setLoading(false) }) } return ( <>
} match={props.match} />
Today  {dateFormat(now, "mmm d")}
  • Add anything or jump to:
  • Order
  • Ticket
  • Goal
  • Support Case 5
  • Upgrade plan Learn more

{ticket.number} - {ticket.title}

{ticket.name}
{dateFormat(ticket.date, 'd mmm yyyy h:mmtt')}
{ ticket.status === "Open" ?   {ticket.status} :   {ticket.status} }

{ticket.description}

Comments

{comments.map(comment => (
{comment.name}
{dateFormat(comment.date, 'd mmm yyyy h:mmtt')}

{comment.description}

))}

Leave A Comment

Add the disabled or readonly boolean attribute on an input to prevent user interactions. Disabled inputs appear lighter and add a not-allowed cursor.
) } TicketDetails.propTypes = { SignInUser: PropTypes.func.isRequired } const mapStateToProps = ({ authUser }) => { return { authUser }; } export default injectIntl(connect( mapStateToProps, {SignInUser} )(TicketDetails))
